Method Detail

createRoundedBounds

protected org.newdawn.slick.geom.RoundedRectangle createRoundedBounds()
Description copied from class: SimpleButtonAppearance
Used by subclasses to create the bounds (set the corner/segments) of this button. If null is returned, we assume the bounds of the component (results in a non-rounded rectangle). Most subclasses will use 0.0f for size and location, and will only override this for different rounded corners and number of segments.

Overrides:
createRoundedBounds in class SimpleButtonAppearance
Returns:
the rounded rectangle for this button, or null
